price: 65. Et ce qu’ils disent ne doit pas t’affliger. La Toute -Puissance appartient à Allah, et c’est Lui Qui Entend Tout, et c’est Lui l’Omniscient.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka qawluhum inna al-ʿizata lillahi jamīʿan huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
